column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We arrived when the lunch crowd was starting to fade.  Service was quick and friendly.  Even though our waitress forgot a couple items
column2: she promptly returned with the request items.  The food itself was OK.  The Salad was OK as was the pizza.  With the pizza
column3: the sauce was great and the crust was deep and crispy.  However
column4: working towards the center of the pie
